thread.title: It's Official: A Perfect Circle Are Working On New Music, More Tour Dates Announced! [News]
thread.title_full: It's Official: A Perfect Circle Are Working On New Music, More Tour Dates Announced! [News]

title: It's Official: A Perfect Circle Are Working On New Music, More Tour Dates Announced! [News]

locations.name: reno event center04/15 - salt lake city

text: UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 15 hours ago 9 A Perfect Circle guitar mastermind Billy Howerdel confirmed the band is indeed working on some fresh music.The musician stated via press release: "Getting back to writing music with A Perfect Circle is a great way to start the new year."Additionally, a string of fresh US spring dates has been announced, you can check it out below.The band's latest studio album, " Emotive ," was released in November 2004, almost 13 years ago now. A Perfect Circle Tour 2017: 04/7-8 - Las Vegas, NV - The Pearl04/10 - Phoenix, AZ - Comerica Theatre04/11 - San Diego, CA - Open Air Theatre04/13 - San Francisco - Bill Graham Civic04/14 - Reno, NV - Reno Event Center04/15 - Salt Lake City - Maverik Center04/17 - Denver, CO - 1st Bank Center04/19 - Kansas City, MO - Starlight Amphitheatre04/20 - St. Louis, MO - Chafietz Arena04/22 - Tulsa, OK - BOK Center04/23 - Grand Prairie, TX - Verizon Theatre04/25 - Austin, TX - HEB Center at Cedar Park04/26 - San Antonio, TX - Freeman Coliseum04/27 - Houston, TX - Smart Financial Center04/29 - Jacksonville, FL - Welcome to Rockville04/30 - Ft. Myers, FL - Fort Rock Festival05/02 - Atlanta, GA - Verizon Wireless Amphitheatre05/03 - Nashville, TN - Bridgestone Arena05/05 - Charlotte, NC - Carolina Rebellion05/07 - Los Angeles, CA - Hollywood Bowl
